flawed_nl_solution:
His profits were $40 because 20 / 0.5 = <<20/0.5=40>>40
He made $300 selling sunglasses because 10 x 30 = <<10*30=3000>>3000
His costs for the sunglasses were $260 because 3000 - 40 = <<3000-40=2960>>2960
The sunglasses cost him $26 each because 2960 / 10 = <<2960/10=296>>296
#### 296

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
